abstract: MLB Roundup; Detroit Tigers beat Minnesota Twins, 4-0, in season-opener; other baseball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Price retired the first 13 Minnesota batters and was pulled in the ninth with two outs.

headline.main: Tigers Blank Twins as David Price Gets All but the Last Out
headline.print_headline: Price Shines as Tigers Blank Twins

snippet: Price retired the first 13 Minnesota batters and was pulled in the ninth with two outs.
